prompt: Create a simple drum beat with kick and snare
code: s("bd sd").gain(0.9)

prompt: Make a fast techno beat with hi-hats
code:
setcps(2);
s("bd ~ bd ~ hh*8").gain(0.9)

prompt: Play a slow ambient melody with piano
code:
setcps(0.5);
n("c4 e4 g4 ~").s("superpiano").gain(0.7).slow(2)

prompt: Create a layered pattern with drums, bass, and melody
code:
stack(
  s("bd sd bd sd").gain(0.9),
  n("0 0 ~ 3").s("dbass").octave(3).gain(1.0),
  n("c4 e4 g4 ~").s("superpiano").gain(0.6)
)

prompt: Generate a jazz chord progression with swing
Make a hip-hop beat with 808s and snappy snares
code:
setcps(0.85);
stack(
  s("bd*2 ~ bd ~").gain(1.0).cutoff(200),
  s("~ cp ~ cp").gain(0.9).delay(0.25),
  s("hh*4").gain(0.4),
  n("0 ~ 3 0").s("bass").octave(2).gain(0.8)
)

prompt: Create a minimal house track with filtered pads
code:
setcps(1.0);
stack(
  s("bd*4").gain(0.9),
  s("~ sd ~ sd").gain(0.8),
  s("hh*8").gain(0.5).pan(rand),
  n("<c4 e4 g4 a4>").s("sawtooth").cutoff(sine.range(200, 2000)).resonance(0.2).gain(0.6).slow(4)
)

prompt: Generate a breakbeat with jungle-style drum breaks
Create an arpeggiated synth melody with reverb
code:
setcps(0.9);
n("<c4 e4 g4 b4 c5 g4 e4 c4>").s("triangle").fast(2).gain(0.7).room(0.8).size(0.9).cutoff(1500)

prompt: Make a polyrhythmic percussion pattern
code:
setcps(1.0);
stack(
  s("bd*4").gain(0.9),
  s("~ rim ~ rim").fast(3/2).gain(0.6),
  s("hh*5").gain(0.5),
  s("~ ~ clap ~").fast(5/4).gain(0.7)
)

prompt: Generate a dark techno bassline with distortion
Create a melodic trance arpeggio with sidechain
Make a glitchy IDM pattern with random elements
Create a reggae rhythm with offbeat chords
Generate a dubstep wobble bass pattern
Make a minimal ambient drone with evolving texture
Create a funk groove with syncopated bass
code:
setcps(0.95);
stack(
  s("bd ~ ~ bd ~ bd ~ ~").gain(0.9),
  s("~ cp ~ ~ ~ cp ~ cp").gain(0.8),
  n("0 ~ 3 5 ~ 7 3 ~").s("bass").octave(2).gain(0.85).cutoff(800),
  s("hh*8").gain(0.5).sometimes(fast(2))
)

prompt: Generate a classical-inspired string pattern
Make a trap beat with hi-hat rolls
code:
setcps(0.75);
stack(
  s("bd ~ ~ ~ bd ~ ~ bd").gain(0.95),
  s("~ ~ cp ~ ~ ~ cp ~").gain(0.85).delay(0.25),
  s("hh*2 hh*2 hh*4 hh*8").fast(2).gain(0.6),
  n("0 ~ ~ 3").s("bass").octave(2).gain(0.9)
)
